subtask1a.title: Move the robot
subtask1a.subtext: Move the robot around, looking confused and searching for the object.

hint1a.text: To make the robot move around, add a 'Turn' block from the 'Movement' category to your program. You can add it after the 'Start' block.

hint1b.text: Make it turn left for 2 seconds.

subtask1b.title: Make the robot look confused
subtask1b.subtext: Change the robot's facial expression to look confused while it searches for the object.

hint2a.text: Add a 'Change Face' block from the 'Face' category to your program.

hint2b.text: Select 'Disoriented' from the list of faces to make the robot look confused.

subtask1c.title: Find the object
subtask1c.subtext: Make the robot find the object it is searching for.

subtask1d.title: Make the robot look surprised
subtask1d.subtext: Change the robot's facial expression to look surprised when it finds the object.

hint3a.text: Add a 'Change Face' block from the 'Face' category to your program.

hint3b.text: Select 'Surprise' from the list of faces to make the robot look surprised.

subtask1e.title: Make the robot look happy
subtask1e.subtext: Change the robot's facial expression to look happy and point to the object it found.

hint4a.text: Add a 'Change Face' block from the 'Face' category to your program.

hint4b.text: Select 'Joy4' from the list of faces to make the robot look happy.

subtask1f.title: Make the robot speak
subtask1f.subtext: Make the robot say 'Aha, there you are!'

hint5a.text: Add a 'Speak' block from the 'Speech' category to your program.

hint5b.text: Add a 'Text' block inside the 'Speak' block and type: 'Aha, there you are!'
